content.text: Kozlov whips his head around to look at the trees. "...Did ya? Wouldn't have thought there's be artifacts that far from the shore... might be a lot safer if there is, though."
You see Kasha already walking towards the treeline. "Less time we spend near the lake, the better," she seems to agree.
Kozlov has to hurry after her, and you jog along close behind. You're not sure how she walks so fast without getting tired.

content.label: Safer is better. You hope.
content.pre-label: Not yet implemented. Do not click.
